mapper.sql: LEFT JOIN zgk_user_collection_3in7 collection on collection.universityId = zz.universityId and collection.majorCode = zz.majorCode and tmp.batch=collection.batch AND collection.userId = #{userId}
INNER JOIN zgk_user_collection_3in7 collection on collection.universityId = zz.universityId and collection.majorCode = zz.majorCode and tmp.batch=collection.batch AND collection.userId = #{userId}
mapper.select: select uu.id as universityId,uu.name as universityName,uu.photo_url as photoUrl,uu.property,uu.rank,uu.educationLevel,dd.name as educationLevelName from zgk_university uu LEFT JOIN zgk_data_dict dd on dd.type='EDULEVEL' AND dd.dictId=uu.educationLevel where uu.id=#{universityId}

select eduLevel,count(eduLevel) as number,dd.name as eduLevelName from (select majorType,batch,universityId,majorCode,pp.planEnrolling from zgk_university_major_enrolling_plan pp where pp.areaId=330000 and pp.year=2016 ) tmp INNER join zgk_zj_3in7 zz on tmp.majorCode=zz.majorCode and tmp.universityId=zz.universityId INNER join zgk_university uu on uu.id=tmp.universityId LEFT JOIN zgk_data_dict dd on dd.type='EDULEVEL' AND dd.dictId=zz.eduLevel where zz.universityId=#{universityId} GROUP BY zz.eduLevel

select count(uu.id) from (select majorType,batch,universityId,majorCode,pp.planEnrolling from zgk_university_major_enrolling_plan pp where pp.areaId=330000 and pp.year=2016 ) tmp INNER join zgk_zj_3in7 zz on tmp.majorCode=zz.majorCode and tmp.universityId=zz.universityId INNER join zgk_university uu on uu.id=tmp.universityId
WHERE uu.id=#{universityId}
